## SubscribeQueuePrefix() function

Sets prefix for subscribe queue

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function SubscribeQueuePrefix(prefix: string): ClassDecorator;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  prefix | string | Prefix that is used for each subscribe from queue |
